pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:0.2_0: The account of the nun Analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:0.5_0: The training rule on lying down on the same sheet
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.11_0: “... How can the nuns do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.14.1_0: ‘If two nuns lie down on the same bed, they commit an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.2_0: two nuns who were lying down on the same bed.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.3_0: When people walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized those nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.4_0: “How can two nuns lie down on the same bed? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1.4_0: fully ordained is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1.5_0: If two lie down on the same bed:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1.6_0: if she lies down when the other person is already lying down, she commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1.7_0: If both lie down together, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1.8_0: Every time they get up and then lie down again, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.2.2_0: if, when one is lying down, the other sits down;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.2.3_0: if they both sit down together;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.2.6_0: The first rule, the training rule on fire, is finished.
